title: Authentic finalises acquisition to take Guess? private
full_text: Authentic finalises acquisition to take Guess? private. Under the agreement, Authentic acquired 51% of substantially all of Guess?’s intellectual property while existing shareholders kept the remaining 49%.. US-based Authentic Brands Group has completed a transaction to take US retailer Guess? private and acquire a majority stake in its intellectual property.
